input.sentences: there 's a whole world out there you do n't know about before having kids . for example | there 's information fairs .
i went to one at the library | and it was full of booth of people trying to convince me i needed their products or services .
my matty would be a slow learner if i did n't get leapfrog products !
i needed the special daycares profiled !
most of all | i needed an au pair ! i did n't even work | and these people tried to convince me to hire them for about 20 minutes !
output.sentences: Matthew was having trouble learning to read
His Mum and Dad had tried engaging a private tutor through the school
But Matthew was still jumbling his words and he was way behind despite the extra help
A friend recommended a new day care centre for dyslexic kids
Matthew needed a thirty minute interview with two teachers to get in, but he's such a bubbly boy, he flew through it!
